trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_MOBHUNTER_000_1<tab>An adventurer on the trail of an elite mark, I'll wager.
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_A1_000_2<tab>Tell me about the rank B elite mark. (Skogs Fru)
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_A1_000_3<tab>Tell me about the rank A elite mark. (Vogaal Ja)
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_A1_000_4<tab>Tell me about the rank S elite mark. (Croque-mitaine)
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_MOBHUNTER_000_10<tab>Oh, a little bit of everythin'. But what I know best are huntin' and the Raimdelle Codex.
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_MOBHUNTER_000_11<tab>You come for the Allied Seals, you stay for the thrill. Them's the rewards of the Hunt.
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_MOBHUNTER_000_12<tab>Go on, then, I know you've got questions. Ask me about them elite marks.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_MOBHUNTER_000_13<tab>You got your danger ranks straight, don't you? Goes B-A-S─remember it like “bastard.” I'd wait on tryin' to find a rank S, though, if I was you.
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_MOBHUNTER_000_20<tab>“The ravening queen of ladybugs, Skogs Fru's natural voracity for pests has taken an unnatural turn.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_MOBHUNTER_000_21<tab>“Not content with emptying the fields of pollen carriers and soil tillers, the adamantine-shelled Skogs Fru has adopted a new diet consisting of chocobos and their riders.”

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_MOBHUNTER_000_30<tab>“Vogaal Ja, a Mamool Ja sellsword of particularly ill repute. Known to be as cruel as he is suspicious, and as suspicious as he is displeasing to the eye.”

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_MOBHUNTER_000_31<tab>A real prince among men, this one. Can't get work on account of seein' every order as a way to get him killed, but claims it's because he's ugly-like. That part at least makes sense, but how that gives him the right to hack folks to bits, he's a mite fuzzy on.
TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_MOBHUNTER_000_40<tab>“While gardening has long been a craft rich in obsession and madness, the goobbue Croque-mitaine has taken the legacy to new extremes...

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_MOBHUNTER_000_41<tab>“From the river whose water irrigates the artful plantings upon his head to the pastures rich in worm castings, the creature keeps a jealous eye on the many wild places that supply his cephalic paradise.

TEXT_REGSEANOTORIOUSMONSTERHINTF1_00183_MOBHUNTER_000_42<tab>“Many an unwary orchid hunter, vermicomposter, and moss monger seeking rich loam have met their end at Croque-mitaine's hands, and his green thumb is well stained with their life's blood.”
